mapper.select: SELECT id, (u.name || ' ' || u.job || ' ' || title) as title, START, "end", user_no from schedule s, "user" u WHERE s.user_no = u.no
SELECT title, start, "end", user_no from schedule WHERE id =#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE "schedule" SET title = #{title}, start = to_date(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), "end" = to_date(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM "schedule" WHERE user_no = #{userNo}, start = to_date(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), "end" = to_date(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
